name: ratu-sovereign-ai
description: Ratu Sovereign AI - Multi-tenant SaaS with Kimi K2 base model

scripts.start:all: concurrently --names "API,WORKER,WEBSITE,DASHBOARD,CONSOLE" -c "blue,green,magenta,cyan,yellow" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:worker" "npm run start:website" "npm run start:dashboard" "npm run start:console"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && timeout 15 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.launch: npm run docker:up && timeout 10 && npm run start:all
